name: Daring Academy
description:
Daring Academy is a game about you moving with your best friend Amelia to a new city for college. Meet Lily, Rose, Dominick and others (All coming next few alphas), create trusts, relationships, explore the deepest parts of Olis, collect clues and tons more in this semester filled with craziness.

Thank you to everyone who helped with the game!

Music composed by Thediamondcrystal, Alex The Hat and JustLetterH.

As of Alpha 1 (0.0.1), only Day 1 is configured.
